__e: My real wound is over there. Stop them!
And you don't like to be hurt, do you.
In the morning I found this stream and I thought maybe I could clean that wound.
No, with this neck, it'll be natural for me to ask.
Yeah, a good, clean flesh wound is better.
But we think he stopped a bullet.
At least we know where the bullet wound came from.
I've never seen a gunshot wound like this!
You got the million-dollar wound, Chief.
It's never been wound from that day to this.
You have inflicted this wound yourself.

Description: You are trapped in an abandoned mine with an injured comrade and you both must get out alive. You must shoot to kill because they are not humans. They are monsters who belong in hell. This is one scary nightmare. Good luck!
And you, with your wound and all...
Maybe she's hurt and can't talk.
The bruise on your foot is gone.
Just save me from another bleeding heart.
Last time I had a sore on my foot.
It's the head wound that did him in.
It's the head wound that did him in.
Because with God's help... he may still be lucky enough to get a nice wound... in his leg or his arm.
